summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Perfect Gigs marketplace iteration 3. All core features working: email/password signup & login, AI Assistant 'Ishan' with in-chat wizards for gig posting and freelancer registration, Browse Freelancers page, Browse Gigs page. Google Sign-in button visible (requires Firebase domain config for full testing).
passed_tests: Backend: /api/health - 200 OK
Backend: /api/categories - Returns 16 categories
Backend: /api/stats - Returns gig and freelancer counts
Backend: /api/auth/signup - Creates new user with JWT token
Backend: /api/auth/login - Authenticates user with correct credentials
Backend: /api/auth/me - Returns user profile with valid token
Backend: /api/gigs - Lists gigs (public)
Backend: /api/gigs POST - Creates gig (authenticated)
Backend: /api/freelancers - Lists freelancers (public)
Backend: /api/freelancer/register - Registers user as freelancer
Backend: /api/ai/chat - AI responds with conversation history support
Frontend: Homepage loads with AI Assistant embedded
Frontend: Signup form works - creates account and redirects to dashboard
Frontend: Login form works - authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Frontend: Google Sign-in button visible on auth page
Frontend: AI Chat 'Post a gig' wizard starts in-chat (Step 1 of 10)
Frontend: AI Chat 'Register as freelancer' wizard starts in-chat (NOT redirect)
Frontend: Browse Freelancers page shows freelancer cards with filters
Frontend: Browse Gigs page shows gig cards with filters
Frontend: Dashboard shows user stats and gig management
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
AI conversation history properly maintained (30 message limit)
JWT authentication working correctly with custom tokens
Freelancer registration handled in-chat as required (not redirecting to /freelancer/register)

test_credentials.note: Test users created dynamically with pattern test_<uuid>@perfectgigs.com

seed_data_creation: Multiple test users and gigs created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Custom JWT auth implemented (not Supabase Auth). AI chat has in-chat wizards for gig posting (10 steps) and freelancer registration. Google Sign-in requires Firebase domain authorization for full testing. Backend uses Supabase for data storage with custom JWT tokens.
